name: Jēra: TTOSG
description:
Jēra: The Temple of Secret gift.
Made for #BYOG2021
Our Theme

Reset  = the adventure about Jēra! and Jēra means "Ending and Rebirth"

Two views:  The Decoy gameplay makes you see Two Views of puzzle

Minimal Interaction: we press two buttons (Left click & E)

Jēra, a boy, can create Decoy, lives in the countryside in the heart of the Bilgabuz mountains, living with his mother and grandfather. One day his grandfather died. Before he died, Grandfather handed over a letter that said: "Kebo" (North letter). It is a map that leads to the Temple of the Wyrm Emperor, and It was written under the place "Reset", Yeran wants to know what it means about grandfather's Reset!

Developer: Team DerCyantist
